headline: The Bull Case For Tyler Technologies (TYL) Could Change Following Raised Revenue Guidance and Earnings Momentum
summary: Tyler Technologies recently reported third quarter 2025 earnings, showing year-on-year revenue growth to US$595.88 million and raised its 2025 revenue guidance to between US$2.34 billion and US$2.36 billion. Alongside this, the company highlighted a growing share buyback program and saw analyst optimism strengthen due to upward revisions in earnings estimates. We'll examine how Tyler Technologies' raised revenue guidance and earnings momentum might reshape its investment narrative and future...
